metadata.title: CVE-2013-0350 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
tmp_smtp.c in pktstat 1.8.5 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary filesvia a symlink attack on /tmp/smtp.log.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pktstat - 1.8.5-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pktstat package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.5-3').
